App Detail: BlockWatch collects and correlates smart-contract events, DEX trades, and validator activity across multiple chains. It provides risk classification, MEV detection, and whale-flow alerts to A2V agents through a unified WebSocket stream. The system supports anomaly labeling and automatic escalation to DeFi insurance models. Data is cryptographically signed, ensuring every analytic insight can be audited on-chain.

App Intro: Tokenized asset gateway for real-world value.
App Detail: RWA Linker indexes tokenized bonds, funds, and commodities issued on regulated chains. Through A2V manifests, each asset stream publishes yield, maturity, and risk metrics accessible to financial agents. It bridges off-chain custodians with DeFi pools using x402 settlement. Institutions use RWA Linker to manage tokenized portfolios and automate income distribution.

DeFiLens visualizes liquidity migration, protocol revenue, and risk contagion in real time. It aggregates TVL, pool composition, and governance metrics from 100+ protocols. Users can train custom AI models that predict incentive effectiveness or rug-pull probability. All analytics are streamed in A2V schema, making them consumable by trading or compliance agents.

App Intro: Real-time vault monitoring and liquidation AI.
App Detail: VaultEye continuously evaluates lending vault collateralization, LTV ratios, and oracle integrity. When anomalies appear, alerts are dispatched to DeFi managers or automated liquidation bots. Built on A2V streaming, every alert includes an explainable-AI trace for post-event auditing. VaultEye integrates seamlessly with ChainBridge for inter-chain alert propagation.

App Intro: Unified on-chain trace and attribution engine.
App Detail: TraceHub reconstructs complete transaction paths across bridges, mixers, and DEX routers. Its graph-embedding engine produces contextual fingerprints that A2V agents can use for AML or behavioral analysis. Law-tech firms and auditors rely on TraceHub for compliance reporting and chain-forensics automation.

StakeFlow gathers staking rewards, uptime, and penalty events across PoS networks. It produces predictive reliability scores so institutional delegators can optimize yield allocation. Via A2V manifests, agents subscribe to validator metrics and rebalance stakes automatically through smart-wallet triggers.

App Intro: AI-driven yield scanner for DeFi protocols.
App Detail: YieldScan crawls liquidity pools and lending platforms to compute adjusted APY after impermanent-loss and gas cost. Its reinforcement-learning agent suggests optimal re-stakes every epoch. Built on A2V/x402, it can even execute yield rotations autonomously through connected wallets.

App Intro: Cross-chain messaging layer for AI agents.
App Detail: BridgeNet synchronizes state between EVM and non-EVM chains for autonomous agents. It provides cryptographic message proofs, rate-limited forwarding, and SLA-based routing. Developers use BridgeNet to coordinate multi-chain agent workflows and maintain deterministic task results.

ChainAudit scans deployed bytecode and configuration parameters, applying both heuristic and ML-based vulnerability detection. Reports are formatted as A2V manifest outputs, enabling downstream governance agents to validate security posture automatically.

AssetGraph visualizes ownership distribution and cross-jurisdictional exposure of tokenized assets. It combines chain data with legal registry information, enabling compliance-ready AI monitoring. Through A2V connectors, reports can be published directly to enterprise BI tools or regulators.
